name: Black Book Ink
tagline: We're inspiring and motivating ideas into reality.
description:
Black Book Ink is a creative studio and advertising agency serving small to midsize brands in the fashion, home interiors, hospitality, and customer lifestyle industries.
Rooted in a "start with Why?" approach, our services include: Advertising, Art Direction, Brand Identity, Collateral Design, Commercials, Concept Development, Content Development, Copywriting, Design Systems, Digital Advertising, E-Commerce Design, Editorial Design, Email Marketing Design, Environmental Design, Event Art Direction, Event Design, Exhibition Design, Illustrations, Lookbook Art Direction, Lookbook Design, Packaging, Print Advertising, Product Photography Art Direction, Responsive Web Design, Signage Design and Strategy.
